00019                 public function kill_claudio()
00020                 {
00021                         global $db;
00022                         
00023                         $db->prepare('DELETE FROM `visits` ' .
00024                                 'WHERE `params` LIKE "%\'_u\' => \'claudio\'%" ' .
00025                                 'OR `params` LIKE "%\'email\' => \'claudio@emeraldion.it\'%"');
00026                         $db->exec();
00027                         
00028                         $db->prepare('OPTIMIZE TABLE `visits`');
00029                         $db->exec();
00030                         
00031                         $this->render(NULL);
00032                 }
00033                 
00038                 public function update_macupdate_ratings()
00039                 {
00040                         global $db;
00041                         
00042                         error_reporting(E_ALL | E_STRICT);
00043                         
00044                         // assume the definition of $theParser (a MURatingsParser object) as in the listing above
00045                         $RSS_PATH = "http://www.macupdate.com/rss/ratings.php?id=2184:4f54cfceed571943d59ac7a951fc19e0";
00046                         // create the object, including the path to your RSS file
00047                         $theParser = new MURatingsParser($RSS_PATH);
00048                         // this may also be done in two steps, omitting the constructer argument:
00049                         // $theParser = new MURatingsParser();
00050                         // $theParser->file = $RSS_PATH;
00051 
00052                         // process the RSS file specified above (when the object was created)
00053                         $theParser->parseFile();
00054                         
00055                         // get all the items from $theParser
00056                         $itemList = $theParser->ratingsList();
00057 
00058                         $mu_factory = new MacupdateEntry();
00059                         foreach ($itemList as $item)
00060                         {
00061                                 $results = $mu_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`mu_title` = '{$db->escape($item['title'])}'"));
00062                                 if (count($results) > 0)
00063                                 {
00064                                         $mu_entry = $results[0];
00065                                         $mu_entry->rating = $item['description'];
00066                                         $mu_entry->url = $item['link'];
00067                                         $mu_entry->save();
00068                                 }
00069                         }
00070                         $this->render(NULL);
00071                 }
00072                 
00077                 public function update_mu_ratings()
00078                 {
00079                         $this->update_macupdate_ratings();
00080                 }
00081                 
00086                 public function update_versiontracker_ratings()
00087                 {
00088                         global $db;
00089                         
00090                         error_reporting(E_ALL | E_STRICT);
00091                         
00092                         $sw = new Software();
00093                         $softwares = $sw->find_all();
00094                         
00095                         foreach ($softwares as $software)
00096                         {
00097                                 $software->has_one('version_tracker_entries');
00098                                 
00099                                 if ($software->version_tracker_entry->vt_id != 0)
00100                                 {
00101                                         $vt = new VTRatingsParser($software->version_tracker_entry->vt_id);
00102                                         $vt->parse();
00103                                         
00104                                         $software->version_tracker_entry->rating = $vt->rating;
00105                                         $software->version_tracker_entry->save();
00106                                 }
00107                         }
00108                         $this->render(NULL);
00109                 }
00110                 
00115                 public function update_vt_ratings()
00116                 {
00117                         $this->update_versiontracker_ratings();
00118                 }
00119         }
